QuestName: The Rent Is Too Cursed High

MemoryInfobox.name: The Rent Is Too Cursed High
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Occasionally, bandits would allow merchants to pass safely through their territory or even stay in their camp for a small fee. One merchant was not so lucky.'

General_Description: '''The Rent Is Too Cursed High''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[merchant]] sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Traveling merchant betrayed by bandits. Need a mercenary.'' She sought out the merchant and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I picked up your message on the board. What's happening?'' *'''Man:''' ''The hardest part of being a traveling merchant is all the travel. Er... I mean, you have to find a place to sleep. I came across a bandit camp and they let me stay there. Even shared their wine with me.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''But then they robbed you. Because they are bandits.'' *'''Man:''' ''I figured if I was giving them [[drachma]]e to stay in the camp, they wouldn't take my drachmae. It made sense at the time. I think. No more drinking wine at bandit camps.'' |-|You want all the outlaws to be killed.= |-|You want the drachmae brought to you.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to get it from the bandits?'' *'''Man:''' ''No.'' *'''Man:''' ''All the bandits must die.'' (Accept - I'll hunt the outlaws.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.'' *'''Man:''' ''What a relief.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's taken care of.'' Kassandra sought out the bandit camp and killed its inhabitants before returning to the merchant. *'''Man:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Man:''' ''I'm a man of my word, so here's your reward.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Trivia: *The memory name is a reference to {{Wiki|Jimmy McMillan}}, leader of the {{Wiki|Rent Is Too Damn High Party}}, saying it, it has since become an internet meme.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
